abstract: Louise Neathway, accused in 2012 of extorting $6,000 from New York Yankees general manager Brian Cashman, is sentenced to five years' probation after pleading guilty to extortion, perjury and criminal impersonation.
lead_paragraph: Louise Neathway, accused in 2012 of harassing and extorting $6,000 from Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman, pleaded guilty to extortion, perjury and criminal impersonation.
snippet: Louise Neathway, accused in 2012 of harassing and extorting $6,000 from Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman, pleaded guilty to extortion, perjury and criminal impersonation.
